verses.text: \w Again|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w*, \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w Danites|strong="H1839"\w*, \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* wife \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w barren|strong="H6135"\w* \w and|strong="H6881"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \f + \fr 13:3 \ft Or Angel; here and throughout chapter 13; corresponding pronouns may also be capitalized.\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w woman|strong="H6135"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w It|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w barren|strong="H6135"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w careful|strong="H8104"\w* \w not|strong="H8354"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w or|strong="H3196"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w not|strong="H8354"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* eat \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w razor|strong="H4177"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nazirite|strong="H5139"\w* \f + \fr 13:5 \ft Or set apart\f* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* womb, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H3467"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* \w went|strong="H8034"\w* \w and|strong="H3372"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* husband, “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w came|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H4397"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*. \w His|strong="H5046"\w* \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w like|strong="H4758"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w awesome|strong="H3372"\w*. \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w where|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H4397"\w* \w from|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H3372"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, ‘\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* eat \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nazirite|strong="H5139"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* God \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* womb \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6279"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* raise \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* God \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* God returned \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* woman \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; \w but|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* husband \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* woman \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* husband, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H7323"\w* came \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* other \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* reappeared!”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w*. \w When|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* man, \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w asked|strong="H1696"\w*, “Are \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* man who \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H6965"\w* am,” \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w*’s \w rule|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w life|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* mission?”

So \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* answered \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* told \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w comes|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w*. \w She|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6680"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.”

“\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* stay here,” \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1423"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w Even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* stay, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w honor|strong="H3513"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* comes \w to|strong="H3068"\w* pass?”

“\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “since \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* beyond comprehension?”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1423"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w marvelous|strong="H6381"\w* thing.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w flame|strong="H3851"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sky|strong="H8064"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w flame|strong="H3851"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife, \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w realized|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w We|strong="H3588"\w* are going \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* wife, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* God!”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife replied, “\w If|strong="H3863"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* intended \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w*, \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w accepted|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w grain|strong="H3605"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w shown|strong="H7200"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w way|strong="H2063"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. \w The|strong="H3205"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w stir|strong="H6470"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* Mahaneh-dan,\f + \fr 13:25 \ft Mahaneh-dan means camp of Dan.\f* \w between|strong="H7307"\w* \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Eshtaol.
